local_schema.longdesc: Whether to use the screen lock setting of mate-screensaver to decide if the screen is locked after a hibernate, suspend or blank screen.
Whether the screen is locked when the computer wakes up from a suspend. Only used if lock_use_screensaver_settings is false.
Whether the MATE keyring is locked before the computer enters suspend. This means the keyring will have to be unlocked on resume.
Whether the MATE keyring is locked before the computer enters hibernate. This means the keyring will have to be unlocked on resume.
Whether the screen is locked when the computer wakes up from a hibernate. Only used if lock_use_screensaver_settings is false.
Whether the screen is locked when the screen is turned off. Only used if lock_use_screensaver_settings is false.
